text_blocks.content: Case 22-1426, Document 78, 06/29/2023, 3536039, Page88 of 217 SA-342 Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 342 of 348

By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
A. MARIE VILLAFANA ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ. COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ. ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a signed addendum to a Non-Prosecution Agreement involving Jeffrey Epstein. The document contains handwritten signatures and dates.
